languages.text: "Из-за чудовищных ран я не сразу заметил служебную татуировку — жертва была трубоведом. А вот это было у него в глотке". {n}Кляйн демонстрирует черное враново перо, покрытое кровью.{/n}
"The wounds were so brutal I almost missed his work tattoo — the victim was a pipewarden. And I found this in his throat." {n}Klein presents a bloodstained raven feather.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Из-за чудовищных ран я не сразу заметил служебную татуировку — жертва была трубоведом. А вот это было у него в глотке". {n}Кляйн демонстрирует черное враново перо, покрытое кровью.{/n}

languages.text: « Ses blessures sont si profondes que j'ai failli passer à côté de son tatouage... La victime était un égoutier. Et j'ai trouvé ceci, coincé dans sa gorge. » {n}Klein désigne une plume de corbeau maculée de sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The wounds were so brutal I almost missed his work tattoo — the victim was a pipewarden. And I found this in his throat." {n}Klein presents a bloodstained raven feather.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ses blessures sont si profondes que j'ai failli passer à côté de son tatouage... La victime était un égoutier. Et j'ai trouvé ceci, coincé dans sa gorge. » {n}Klein désigne une plume de corbeau maculée de sang.{/n}

languages.text: «Las heridas eran tan salvajes que casi no veo su tatuaje de trabajo; la víctima era un inspector de tuberías. Y encontré esto en su garganta». {n}Klein te muestra una pluma de cuervo manchada de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The wounds were so brutal I almost missed his work tattoo — the victim was a pipewarden. And I found this in his throat." {n}Klein presents a bloodstained raven feather.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Las heridas eran tan salvajes que casi no veo su tatuaje de trabajo; la víctima era un inspector de tuberías. Y encontré esto en su garganta». {n}Klein te muestra una pluma de cuervo manchada de sangre.{/n}

languages.text: “伤口实在是太血腥了，我差点就没注意到他身上的氏族纹身——死者生前是一名管道员。而且，我还在他的喉咙里发现了这个。”{n}克莱因拿出了一根沾了血的乌鸦羽毛。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The wounds were so brutal I almost missed his work tattoo — the victim was a pipewarden. And I found this in his throat." {n}Klein presents a bloodstained raven feather.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “伤口实在是太血腥了，我差点就没注意到他身上的氏族纹身——死者生前是一名管道员。而且，我还在他的喉咙里发现了这个。”{n}克莱因拿出了一根沾了血的乌鸦羽毛。{/n}

languages.text: 「その傷はあまりに残忍で、危うく彼の仕事の刺青を見逃すところでした。被害者はパイプ作業員です」 {n}クラインは血に染まったカラスの羽を差し出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The wounds were so brutal I almost missed his work tattoo — the victim was a pipewarden. And I found this in his throat." {n}Klein presents a bloodstained raven feather.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その傷はあまりに残忍で、危うく彼の仕事の刺青を見逃すところでした。被害者はパイプ作業員です」 {n}クラインは血に染まったカラスの羽を差し出した。{/n}

languages.text: "Die Wunden waren so brutal, dass ich sein Arbeitstattoo fast übersehen hätte. Das Opfer war ein Rohrhüter. Und ich habe das hier in seinem Rachen gefunden." {n}Klein präsentiert eine blutverschmierte Rabenfeder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The wounds were so brutal I almost missed his work tattoo — the victim was a pipewarden. And I found this in his throat." {n}Klein presents a bloodstained raven feather.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Wunden waren so brutal, dass ich sein Arbeitstatoo fast übersehen hätte. Das Opfer war ein Rohrhüter. Und ich habe das hier in seinem Rachen gefunden." {n}Klein präsentiert eine blutverschmierte Rabenfeder.{/n}

languages.text: "Yaralar öylesine gaddarca açılmış ki iş dövmesini neredeyse gözden kaçırıyordum. Kurban bir hat muhafızıymış. Bunu da boğazında buldum." {n}Klein, kan içinde kalmış bir kuzgun tüyü uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The wounds were so brutal I almost missed his work tattoo — the victim was a pipewarden. And I found this in his throat." {n}Klein presents a bloodstained raven feather.{/n}
